title: You get to use your main's ult IRL
body:
Do you use your powers for good or evil? How deadly or powerful would it be? How could you use it in your every day life? Or just say how much you would like having it.

For me my most played champions is {{champion:19}}  . I would probably use this for evil and good depending on the situation. The ult would be pretty deadly and I could use this to take down anyone I want ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) fite me irl nerd.

replies.body:
{{champion:412}} 
I have a pentagon around me...now what?
You get arrested for breaking and entering into the US government's facilities.
https://p.gr-assets.com/540x540/fit/hostedimages/1380373721/727426.gif
Extra points if you can add ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) to your response

> [{quoted}](name=ThatAtheist,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EppWJLvX,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-16T00:49:05.485+0000)
>
> Extra points if you can add ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) to your response

I'll show you my tibbers
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Thus ends humanity.

We had a good run.

THE DAWN HAS ARRIVED

I can do things

{{champion:2}}  RAHHHHHHHH

Just.

Damn it. 

Maybe I'll hit people even harder? Spiritual energy explodes out of my hand when I slap someone?

{{champion:432}} TACTICAL ZHONYAS STRIKE

{{champion:254}} I think technically anyone can do this.

{{champion:201}} I'm too young to be knocking people up, let alone entire groups.

{{champion:117}} As a male, I can already grow bigger to knock people up. Just on a... longer cooldown.

{{champion:16}} *Technically* I can already wish, but healing people would be a huge bonus!

Just the ult? Hmm...

{{champion:267}} Um...hard to find a use for it.
{{champion:76}} I mean, yeah, that's cool.
{{champion:60}} Also cool.
{{champion:25}} Not sure how useful this is...

For Nami, I have one place in mind.

California.

{{champion:62}} Technically I can do his Ult IRL.... I'd just be really dizzy afterwards .__.

Of course you're going to get in trouble when the timer runs out and he explodes in knives killing everybody near him.

But hey, a day from work right?
No more need be said
